room_title: Escape room "Vacation Vandals" by Key Quest in Boston
review: First time there this past weekend, great time! Although I feel like the main arena we used was a bit tight for how many people were let in, not much room to actually run around without the fear of close-lining someone by accident around a corner, haha. Was fun regardless!

room_title: Escape room "Vacation Vandals" by Key Quest in Boston
review: My kids Loved this place. Had my 10 to 13 year olds and they had a Blast. Had a Lot of FUN.Xo

room_title: Escape room "Vacation Vandals" by Key Quest in Boston
review: Was here for my bachelorette party. Had tons of fun! The Laser Quest itself is also worth checking out.
